short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes gradient overlays from images in your Flickr contacts feed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Photos from your contacts in the Flickr activity feed are shown with a dark gradient across the top of the image. This extension removes the gradient so the entire photo can be seen. The gradient is added back when you hover the photographer's contact information so their name can be read.
